name: Etherscape
description:
Welcome to the Ether.

Etherscape is in the proof of concept stage, but already I'm getting positive feedback that people are enjoying playing it.  What's so awesome about it?

  • Killer original soundtracks and bespoke sound effects
  • Procedurally generated levels; if you're into zenning out with a grappling hook, you're in for a never-ending treat 
  • You no longer need to ask Spiderman how it feels to fly
  • Shapes.  Huge, huge shapes.
  • Upgrade your hook and zen some more!
In the distant future...

...people will communicate over vast distances by use of the Ether, a parallel dimension accessible via meditation and rigorous mental discipline. The process allows an intrepid courier to project her consciousness into a construct she has formulated piece by minute piece in her mind's eye. She deftly swings through the Ether, delivering vital data and communications across distances that would be prohibitive in real-space, meeting other travelers, and uncovering strange relics from the other side.
